text: pUrva#yA&Biqjaya#ti manuShyalOqkamutta#rayAq BUya#sO yaj~jakraqtUnupai$tyEqShA vai suqmanAq nAmEShTiqryamaqdyEjAqnaM paqScAccaqndramA# aqByu#dEtyaqsminnEqvAsmai# lOqkE&rddhu#kaM Bavati dAkShAyaNa yaqj~jEna# suvaqrgakA#mO yajEta pUqrNamA#sEq saM na#yEn-maitrAvaruqNyA &&mikSha#yA &mAvAqsyA#yAM ~MyajEta pUqrNamA#sEq vai dEqvAnA(gm)# suqtastEShA#mEqtama#rddhamAqsaM prasu#taqstEShA$M maitrAvaruqNI vaqSA&mA#vAqsyA#yA-manUbaqndhyA# yat - [  ]  30
